inn1.comm: starts with a tight delivery just outside off, good leave from Gayle
another leave just outside off
this one comes in a touch and Gayle is struck just above the pad and below the thigh pad, he doesn't seem to be in too much pain
strays on the pads, and that is tucked in front of square for the first run of the day
back of length ball on the stumps, Charles watchfully gets behind the line and defends that one
almost a yorker, a full ball that Charles manages to squeeze out to the leg side, good over to start from Bhuvneshwar
Umesh charges in, he has a leg slip in place for Gayle, this one is outside off and is chopped in the direction of point
this one is much fuller from Umesh, Gayle stays in the crease and opens the face to guide the ball past point. Charles has to sprint back for the second to beat the throw from Raina
Gayle punches that towards extra cover
Umesh bowls this down the leg side, it was a short one as well, Umesh trying to trap Gayle with a catch at leg slip perhaps, too far down the leg side
short again, and on the leg stump, that ball doesn't get up high enough to worry Gayle, it is midway behind his waist and chest and that is thumped away to the midwicket boundary for four
not as short as the previous one, outside off this time, powered towards cover where Kohli cuts it off

drops it short once more, and on the legstump, this time Gayle doesn't power the ball, concentrates more on getting his timing and placement right, lifts his front leg high as he pulls that away to the midwicket boundary
defended towards the leg side by Charles
short of length ball, just outside off, Charles opens the face to steer the ball towards point
keeps pegging away at that off stump, this was 132 kph, careful defence from Charles
just outside off this time, again opens the face and plays it softly towards third man to get off the mark
nearly an edge through to the keeper there, back of a length ball that swerves away late from Gayle, who throws his bat at it and misses
a touch fuller, on middle and off, defended from the crease to the off side, another probing over from Bhuvneshwar
first ball is defended from the crease to the leg side
short of length ball, 133.7kph, heading for off stump, more defence
a muted appeal for lbw, the first of the day, that was sliding down the leg side, and might have gone over the stumps height as well, Charles was looking to flick to the leg side and he misses
angled into middle and leg, another short of length ball is calmly defended
again opens the face, sends the ball to the right of third man for a single
Power. pitched up by Ishant and that is lashed down the ground by Gayle, between the bowler and mid-off, when Gayle hits them, no need to bother chasing, four more to Gayle, who has begun briskly
on middle stump, and that is clipped towards square leg for a single
short of length ball on off stump, not giving Gayle any room at all, pushed towards mid-off
Gayle charges out and wants to try throw Bhuvneshwar off his tidy line and length, not something you see this often in a Gayle innings, a thick inside-edge sends the ball behind square leg

no need for extravagance when you can hit like that, a length ball just outside off, Gayle waits deep in the crease and plays a lofted straight drive that sends the ball rocketing over Bhuvesnhwar's head for four
cramps up Gayle with a ball on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket

there is the wicket, Bhuvneshwar has done it, MS Dhoni had talked a lot about the importance of Gayle's wicket, and they have him early, a short of length ball again from Bhuvneshwar, not enough width for Gayle to cut that, he goes for the cut anyway, a thick top edge results and the ball flies towards first slip, where Ashwin clings on to a sharp overhead chance, huge blow that
shortish ball outside off from Ishant, a controlled chop towards point
drops it short and angling away from Darren Bravo, who allows the ball through to the keeper
length ball on off stump, careful defence from the crease from Bravo
too wide outside off to interest Bravo this early in the innings, 133.5kph from Ishant, that is also left alone
length ball on leg stump, tucked towards short leg, no run results, just one off the over so far
outside off and another leave, Ishant finishes a tidy over
Charles again gets a run by opening the face and sending the ball towards third man, most of his runs today have come in that region
angling across outside off, defended towards point
full ball on the pads, hardly any effort as Bravo pushed at that one, but it was wonderfully timed, beats Dinesh Karthik at mid-on and races away for four
Bhuvneshwar reverts to his short of length and around off formula, Bravo shuffles to make a touch of room, chops the ball towards cover
a crisp drive towards cover, not placed well enough to get a run
length ball outside off, watchfully defended to the off side
full ball on middle stump, whipped towards midwicket
length ball on off stump, tucked towards midwicket for a single
a good-looking drive from Bravo, a full ball is sent away towards cover but again Bravo can't find the right placement
short of length ball outside off, flails at it and misses, it snuck under his bat there
full and just outside off, blocked past the bowler and towards mid-off for a single, Ishant missed that after running across from mid-on but mid-off was there to cover
a shortish ball is pulled firmly towards short midwicket, nearly carries to Raina there, who has to react quickly, Umesh rues what he thinks is a chance
length ball on off stump, defended towards cover
length ball on off stump, Bhuvneshwar continues to be impeccable with his line and length, defended back towards the bowler
full and outside off, looks to drive that between cover and extra, doesn't time it too well though, the ball rolls towards extra cover
Johnson Charles can hit them, he hadn't shown that most of today, but here he shows how string his bottom hand is, a pitched up delivery is swiped to the midwicket boundary
and once more, Charles has been keeping calm till now, but with him you never know when a crazy shot will come, this time he skips down the track and thumps the ball to midwicket for four more
Bhuvneshwar has his hands on his head as Charles gets an inside egde while looking to play the forward defensive, the ball rolls to the leg side instead of towards cover as Charles intended
opens the face to steer the ball behind point for a single
length ball on off stump, careful defence off the front foot towards mid-off
lovely hit, instead of the swings towards midwicket this time Charles lofts it over the bowler's head, a length ball from Umesh, Charles plants his front foot forward and launches that for four more
intelligently done by Charles, that was on the pads, he notes that the fine leg is in the circle and deftly glances the ball for four to the right of the man there
dreadful bowling this, with fine le up why bowl at the pads? Umesh being taken for plenty here, this time Charles sends the ball to the left of short fine leg for four more
and after those three fours, here a typical Charles shot, another swipe at a short ball, he misses this time, never know what to expect with Charles on strike
length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side
length ball just outside off, carved just behind point for a single
is Johnson Charles the most unpredictable batsman around? after that classic cover drive, he charges out and looks to muscle a length ball over mid-on, a thick outside edge down to third man for four
off the pads and down to short fine leg for a leg bye
defended back towards the bowler
deflected to the leg side
clipped towards square leg for a single
a length ball from Ashwin is blocked to the off side
on the pads, tucked towards square leg for a single

Charles is clueless against Ashwin, what was that shot he was playing? the carrom ball and he has no idea about it, a leading edge as he looks to play the ball to the leg side, the ball floats in the air and lands agonisingly wide of Ashwin, Charles looked seriously inept against that variation from Ashiwn
slapped off the back foot behind point for a single
pushed towards cover for a single
almost carries back to Kohli, a firmly drive that eludes Kohli
worked towards square leg for one more
huge lbw appeal from India as Chrles stays in the crease and looks to play a length ball to the leg side, he misses and is hit on the pads in front of leg, that would have missed the stumps though
Charles gets on the front foot foot and defends
drops it short and Charles muscles that towards sweeper cover, seemed headed for the boundary but Ishant puts in a dive to stop that
flighted ball is defended to the off side
on the pads, nudged towards square leg for a single
the 50 stand comes up as Charles helps the ball along to fine leg for a couple
on leg stump, again Charles glances the ball but can't beat short fine
outside off this time, a better line from Ashwin, it"s that carrom ball again which has Charles flummoxed, he looks to chop that through the off and is beaten
another carrom ball, defended back towards the bowler
good length delivery on off, Bravo defends it to point
full ball on middle and off, squeezed out to the leg side
length ball on leg stump, defended towards square leg
well outside off and that is helped towards short third man for a single, Ashwin slips as he fields that one
another boundary for Charles, who has galloped to 42 off 40, gets on one knee and sweeps that past the diving man at backward square leg, nicely done by Charles
lashed towards cover, caught by Raina who pretends that it is a catch, the crowd screams, wasn't a chance as that bounced before reaching the fielder
spinning away from Bravo, who goes deep in the crease and defends
moves towards legstump and dabs that towards the off side
a touch short and that is powered towards deep point by Bravo
length ball just outside off, defended off the front foot to the leg side
a huge pause from Ashwin before he delivers, it is an offspinner, played towards square leg
just outside off, Bravo backs away and slaps that towards point for a siungle
more width for the batsmen, chopped towards deep square leg
length ball heading for middle, solidly defended to the leg side

that's gone away for six, an inside-out high-risk stroke from Charles, backs away a touch to make room, a full ball is launched to the deep extra cover boundary, it is a short boundary, and that just about clears the rope, don't think the Umesh, who was in the deep, picked up where the ball was, didn't move too quickly towards the ball
full ball just outside off, punched towards long-on for a single to bring up Charles' 50
gets forward and defends this one towards the off side
a full toss on leg stump, Kohli lucky to escape with that one, helped along to short fine leg
Jadeja starts off on the pads, he works it to midwicket
flatter delivery and he pushes it towards cover
keeps it tight, he pushes it towards the bowler
he shapes to cut and he cuts it down to short third man
bowls it flat and keeps it tight, he defends
starts off with a maiden, keeps it tight again, Bravo pushes it back to the bowler
bit of turn and he gets forward and blocks
Charles makes room before delivery, carves a shorter one over Ishant at short fine leg, Ishant gives chase and just about pulls it back, overthrows as well
tossed up and he comes forward and blocks
just over wide long-on! Tossed up and Charles went forward and lofted him downtown to one of the longer boundaries
slides down the leg side from round the wicket, he tries to tuck it away
flatter delivery, he knocks it to the on side
tucks it away towards midwicket for a single
keeps it tight, slip in place, Charles knocks it softly to the on side
he sweeps and it goes straight to Umaesh at square leg, he was placed for that shot

that was as plumb as it gets! This was a flatter delivery from Jadeja, on the off stump and not turning, Charles was back at the crease playing for the turn, tried to play across the line, that would have taken the off stump
flatter delivery, he gets across and works it to the on side
Sharma returns for a new spell, short of a length and the bounce silences Samuels, he pokes at it outside off
fuller in length on the off stump and he pushes it to the off side
Samuels at sea here, this was even wider outside off and he was fishing at it without moving his feet
Samuels not looking comfortable against Ishant, this was fuller and he had to lunge forward to defend
pushes it softly towards cover and thinks of a single but heads back
Samuels must be glad the over has ended, this was outside off and he decides to leave it alone not in the most convincing way though
flat on the off stump and defended
gets across and tucks it to the on side
shuffles and works it towards the on side
he shuffled a bit too much, almost clipped his pads straight in front of the stumps
goes back and pushes it to the off side

defends very close to the pads and it prompts a shout, he was given not out and India are reviewing it. It landed on the off stump and bent in a little with the angle, Samuels was forward, Hot Spot showed it hit the pad first and then the bat, the ball tracker showed that hitting leg stump, Aleem Dar's decision is overturned
this was angling across the left-hander and he leaves it alone
lands it outside off and he pushes it to the off side
Bravo still looks shaky, not himself today, tentatively blocks this out
prods forward and gets an inside edge towards midwicket and sets off
Sarwan gets across and softly pushes it towards point and tells Bravo to stay back
another tight over from Ishant, he doesn't give much room, punches it towards point
full on middle and leg and he pushes it towards midwicket
flatter one on the pads and he knocks it towards square leg
this was flatter and Bravo cuts him wide of point
comes well forward and blocks it to the off side
turns it away towards midwicket

RJ has taken three! Caught down the leg side, Jadeja pushed it wide of the leg stump, Sarwan was looking to glance it to fine leg, Dhoni was absolutely certain and so was Aleem Dar, Hot Spot confirmed the edge
keeps it outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
huge cheers and Raina effects an athletic save at short cover, it was solidly driven, super fielding
a sharp bouncer! Bravo wanted to hook it and took his eyes off the ball, lobs off the top half of the bat and clears Dhoni
close call for Bravo as he gets an inside edge to the pads
very neatly driven past the covers to the sweeper, only a single but Bravo will be glad he middled it
teasing line from Ishant! He's a changed bowler today or what, this was slower, the batsman was poking forward and nearly edged it
full on the stumps and clipped to the on side
comes well forward and blocks
flatter delivery and he stays forward and defends
shorter one and he punches it towards midwicket
drifts towards the pads and he works it to square leg
flatter one and he knocks it to square leg
starts off with a low full toss and Dwayne drives firmly  but the stumps at the other end save a few runs, that was traveling quickly
keeps him on the back foot this time and he defends
short of a length and he punches it to the off side
little fuller in length and he pushes it towards cover
slightly short of a length and he fends it off
fuller delivery and he comes forward and blocks
starts off with a flatter one which he blocks forward
comes forward and across and he pushes it to the off side
defends close to the pads and a little excitement behind the stumps
goes back at the crease and works it to the on side
slides down the leg side and it may have brushed something, no wide called
comes well forward and blocks and it's a maiden
poor line from Umesh, he slides down the leg side and Dwayne gets a tickle and fine leg who is squarer cannot get across and save it
this was outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
this one nips back in quite a bit in the air after pitching, well left
that'a s lovely punch from Dwayne, this was a length ball but too straight, shows the full face of the bat and forces it wide of mid-on
shorter in length and he safely leaves it alone
stays behind the line and punches it towards mid-off, better over for WI
flatter one and he pushes it towards the bowler
shorter and he rocks back and cuts to point
nips back in and he defends close to the pads
gets well forward and smothers the spin
down the leg side and he tries to sweep but the ball was hitting him outside the line of leg
played inside the line and he's beaten, good delivery
it;s that man Jadeja again, slides at short cover and saves a few runs, firmly driven
this was short and wide and he mistimes that one to point
angles across him and he angles it down to short third man
drifts on the pads and he works it away down to fine leg
keeps it straight and he blocks it out
Dwayne finding his rhythm with boundaries here, this was dragged short and he rocked back and pulled high over midwicket
flatter delivery and he comes forward and blocks
commits forward and blocks it to cover
spins back in and hits his pads as he goes well across his stumps
flatter one and he comes forward and defends
Ashwin keeps it tight and he blocks it out
pauses before delivery and slides it down leg, tries to run it down to fine leg, it rolls to short fine leg, never seen Darren struggle so much
that's a stylish square cut but straight to backward point, he had the width
keeps it outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
gets away with a poor ball, short and wide outside off and Dwayne can only chop it towards mid-off
this was cleverly played, he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
sharp work in the field! Darren shaped to play a ferocious square cut and Rohit was brilliant at backward point sliding to his right
drifts a bit on the pads and he knocks it to midwicket

Darren's misery ends thanks to a brilliant delivery! Ashwin bowls from roind the wicket, he relies on flight and turn to outfox Darren Bravo, the batsman was down the track on seeing the flight and was forced to check his shot after the ball turned, he couldn't block it away, sharp turn and Dhoni did the rest
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
stays back and clips it with the turn to midwicket
slower through the air and he softly pushes it to the off side
this was the straighter one and he punches it to the bowler
stays back and clips it to the on side
tucks him up for room and Bravo punches it wide of point for a single
good bowling from BK, Pollard moves across his stumps and doesn't offer a shot, it was a good leave
hits a good length on off and middle and he stays back and defends
keeps it tight, no room to free his arms, Pollard is happy getting across and defending
Pollard walks across to try and score and he can only push it back to the bowler
Bravo moves across and tucks the offspinner towards square leg
goes deep in the crease as he blocks the ball towards mid-on

on a length, not turning much, glanced towards backward square leg, Pollard races across, Jadeja is the fielder, he fires the ball towards the non-striker,  Bravo collide with Ashwin as he completes the run
0 off 10 now for Pollard after he defends to the off side
ho ho ho, what a way to get off the mark, a pitched up ball is smacked over the bowler's head for a six, lands just short of the sightscreen

from 0 off 10 to 12 off 12, Pollard strike-rate takes two balls to go from 0 to 100, and this time it is a monster hit, a powerful swipe sends that towards wide long-on, way over the rope and into the stands
defended towards the off side from the crease
length ball on the pads, defended towards midwicket, thought of a single before deciding to turn back
slower ball, 116kph, full and on the pads, fine leg was in the circle, that should have been put away for four, but the glance from the batsman only sends the ball to the man at short fine
a leading edge, drops short of the man at cover, a back of length ball, and that loops off Pollards bat towards the fielder, lands well short though
square driven towards cover point, powerfully struck, and Jadeja can't hold on to that, the misfield allows a single
Dwayne Bravo can look so stylish when in form, he casually flicks this slower length ball off the pads towards midwicket, something very Caribbean in that shot, fetches him a couple
Pollard gently dabs this length ball towards third man for a single
length ball on middle stump, flicked towards deep midwicket for one more
length ball on middle, Pollard moves across and wants to whip that to the midwicket boundary, he misses and is hit on the pads, that was going over the stumps
back of a length ball outside off, superbly timed push by Pollard nearly sends the ball all the way to deep extra cover, Raina gives chase and does splendidly to cut it off in time

looked like a sensational shot from Bravo, a flamboyant hook that Bravo didn't bother trying to keep on the ground, he connected well with that 142kph short ball from Umesh, but not well enough to clear the rope, and who was waiting for that one but the man himself, Ravindra Jadeja
short of length ball just outside off, Sammy stands tall and guides the ball towards point
short of length ball on off stump, defended down the track
bangs it in short, Pollard spots it early and lets that 138kph ball through to the keeper
shortish once more, just outside off, defended from the crease to the off side

keeps it on the shorter side, Pollard blocks it towards cover, Raina fields and throws the ball between his legs without looking to see where the bowler is, Ishant was only a couple of yards away and that throw hits him on his backside, Raina has a laugh over it
outside off and that is left alone
Sammy has the bat waving around before the bowler delivers, a terrific sight that, he brings down the bat to block out the final ball of the over, Ishant going well in the Powerplay
back of length 143kph delivery, just outside off, defended to the off side
that was 142 from Umesh, not too far from off, Pollard still went for an expansive cut, he is beaten, West Indies continue to stutter in the Powerplay
length ball just outside off, defended to the leg side this time
short of length ball outside off, driven towards cover, and that is another dot bal
a touch short once more, Pollard struggling to middle it, goes for the pull, but can't hit it as well as he would like, the ball rolls towards midwicket
same length delivery, stays a bit lower, on the pads, Pollard squeezes it towards square leg for a single, just 24 runs in the Powerplay
bangs it in short and Pollard goes for a big cross-batted stroke, doesn't connect though
fuller than the previous one, Pollard stays in the crease and dabs the ball towards point for a single
outside off, keeping it on the short side, 138kph, left alone by the batsman
keeps it short, clearly a tactic here, Sammy looks to swipe that to the leg side and he misses, during the IPL Ishant would have learnt a lot about how Sammy bats
short of a length ball, a bit of width there, Sammy slices that past cover for a single, just two off the over so far
fuller this time and on the pads, helped along to fine leg for one more
Jadeja is back, his first ball is swiped towards midwicket for a single
round-arm action, not much flight, just outside off, defended
a bit more width, slapped to point, another dot ball

is that a run-out, Sammy defended to the right of the bowler, Jadeja was onto the ball quickly, Sammy went for the quick single, Jadeja pounced and got the direct hit, Sammy dived a touch too early but it was still enough for him to make his ground, the third umpire takes plenty of replays to make his decision, and what's more, the West Indies pinched an overthrow as well
outside off, and that is slapped towards point, just three off this over so far
pitches on a length and spins away outside off, past the keeper and to Ashwin at slip, only a muted appeal for a catch after Sammy missed that

Ishant strikes, he abandons the short-ball strategy, fires this full, just where Pollard likes it, Pollard wanted to muscle that over long-on for six, doesn't hit it as well as he liked, picks out Bhuvneshwar at long-on, first wicket for Ishant who is rewarded for a good spell today
short of length and outside off, Narine shoulders arms to that one
and once more Narine is happy to let the ball through to the keeper
back of length ball on off stump, Narine gets behind the line and defends
short of length and just outside off, Narine stays in the crease and defends towards point
a wide outside off stump, Ishant's chance of a wicket maiden disappears
same length on leg stump, tucked to square leg for a single and Narine retains the strike
Narine goes for an extravagant lofted drive to a pitched up delivery from over the wicket, the ball spins too much, misses the bat and the stumps and the keeper to go for  four byes
full and on the pads, clipped to backward square leg for a single
a touch short, Sammy arches back and slaps that towards sweeper cover, can they get two, no just one

and another one for Jadeja, the man can't do a thing wrong, Narine needed to turn over the strike to Sammy, instead he went for another high-risk stroke, a lofted drive against the spin, he edges it and it swirls to cover, career-best figures for Jadeja (so far)
defended off the front foot towards the bowler
more careful defence to end the over
starts with a quick ball, shortish and just outside off, Rampaul opens the face and lets the ball through to the keeper

stop the press, Jadeja misses a direct hit! had plenty of time and a good view of the stumps as well, Rampaul gets inside the line of the ball and defends towards cover, bounces nicely for Jadeja who takes aim and fires, but misses
looks for a ferocious pull but badly mistimes it and the ball rolls away to the leg side for a single
on middle and leg stump, defended back towards the bowler
poked towards point and Rampaul gets off the strike
short of length ball, Sammy was initially looking for the big hit, didn't have the room, and the ball wasn't full enough either, blocked back to the bowler
dabs the ball towards backward point, but not enough time to get a single
spins in towards Rampaul who flicks it to midwicket, sets off for one before Sammy sends him back

five for Jadeja, so what if he missed a direct hit in the previous over, he hits the stumps this time, he bowls it full, Rampaul goes for the sweep and misses, the ball lands and turns in to crash into the stumps, this is now the best bowling performance by an Indian in the Champions Trophy
Jadeja from round the wicket, a mild lbw appeal, but that was sliding down
again on the pads, again it was sliding down
a solid forward defensive to end the over, a wicket maiden for Jadeja, dream day indeed
shortish ball, Sammy looks to muscle it over the leg side, edges it oer the top of cover and they scamper two
serious power there! wow, short of length ball and that is a monstrous flat-batted hit from Sammy, sends that crashing into the sightscreen
another big swing, this time the ball rolls towards long-on for a single, can Roach survive this over?
sliding down the leg side, surely a wide, got to be a wide, umpire doesnt give it a wide, Roach can't believe it
length ball on middle and leg, blocked down the track
pitched up and angling into the pads, clipped towards mid-on, a single could have been taken but Sammy declines it
huge backlift from Sammy, who wanted to hammer that over the leg side, but at the last moment decides to defend to the off side
more defence from Sammy
on the pads, Sammy tucks it towards midwicket, immediately calls for two, the throw is poor though and Roach manages to scamper back
a rare poor ball from Jadeja, a touch too short, Sammy swivels and crunches that behind square leg for four, Sammy punches the air after that
pushed towards mid-off for a single, Roach has to survive one ball this over
short and on middle stump, dead-batted by Roach
pitched up and outside off, crashed past cover for four, all power from Sammy, who is playing a crucial hand here
full ball and that is a massive hit from Sammy, Ishant goes for a yorker, he misses and goes for the maximum instead, a huge backlift and clean swing, sends that for a big six
short and outside off, Sammy wanted to clobber that over the midwicket boundary, gets a top edge and that flies down to third man for four more, West Indies are now 212, Sammy 35 off 27

another six, Ishant was having one of those rare days when he bowled economically, it is still not a disaster, but he's now gone for 20 in his four previous deliveries, this was short and Sammy absolutely powers it over long-off for another boundary
swung away to deep square leg for one more, one ball for Roach to bat
sensible stuff from Roach, it was a short of length ball outside off, Roach shoulders arms to that one
full,flat and wide outside off, Sammy's swipe doesn't connect
much too short, and what power once more from Sammy, murders it over Jadeja's head for four more
Sammy swinging at everything now, another edge, almost carries to short third man, just lands short though, they don't take the single
what a shot to reach his fifty, sensational hit from Sammy, thumped flat and over sweeper cover for six, again immense power from Sammy, punches the air after a superb comeback innings
thumped down to long-off, but Sammy declines the single

and he finishes it off in superb style, another thunderous straight hit, over Jadeja's head for four more, Sammy finished on 56 off 35, West Indies have been lifted to a competitive 233, last two overs yielded 35 runs and that too with nine wickets down

inn2.comm: Roach starts with a shortish ball, angling in towards the body, defended from the crease to the leg side
bowled from wide of the crease, doesn't fire it in towards the stumps though, too wide outside off
closer to the stumps this time, Rohit moves across and shoulders arms
and again, this was a touch wider than the previous one, again Rohit leaves it to the keeper
lovely controlled cut from Rohit, shortish from Roach and he had some width as well, slapped over backward point for four
what a beauty of a response, back of a length ball coming in, Rohit pokes at it from the crease and is beaten
length ball angling in, pushed towards mid-on, five off the first oer
two slips in place for Rampaul, who starts with a 132.6kph delivery just outside off, left alone by Dhawan
fuller this time and a touch wider, another leave
length ball and well outside off, Dhawan goes after it, sends it behind point for a single
angling into the pads, helped down to fine leg for one more
a mistimed drive to a length ball outside off, looking to send the ball through the covers but it ends up dribbling towards the bowler
stays back in the crease, opens the face and taps the ball towards third man for a single
on the pads and that is clipped towards deep square leg for three, well run by the Indian openers
short of length ball, 142kph, Rohit waits in the crease and wafts at it outside off, beaten
full and just outside off, 142kph again, solidly defended to the off side
a length ball outside off, Rohit doesn't time it perfectly as he attempts a cover drive
shortish and well outside off, Rohit resists the temptation to chase after that
back of length ball, outside off, takes the outside edge as Rohit looks to drive, safely down towards third man for a single
short from Rampaul, who grunts as he delivers that one, Rohit stands tall and a controlled glide sends the ball to third man for a single
Dhawan is in red-hot form, and he's showing it here, a pitched up delivery, Dhawan gets a stride in and thrashes that over point for four
looks to lash that one as well, a touch shorter and outside off, takes the top edge and zips towards third man, reaches the fielder there on the bounce
short of length and outside off, left alone
a great looking drive there, but can't place it wide of the man at cover, again Rohit makes it look so simple
on the shorter side, Rohit gets on top of the bounce and slaps that down to third man
a thick inside edge sends a pitched-up delivery from Roach towards fine leg
full ball angling in towards the stumps, managed to squeeze that one out, 145kph from Roach
width on offer, powerfully slapped past point for four, for a second there I thought the ball was flying straight to backward point, but it was wide of the man there
pretty close to the stumps, Rohit plays a risky shot down to third man, opening the face
another full and fast ball, 143kph, dug out by Dhawan
short of length ball on the pads, thrashed between mid-on and midwicket, Dhawan continues to enjoy his second coming in international cricket
Rohit is profiting from these short and wide deliveries, guides this one down to third man
back of a length ball, just outside off, Dhawan waits for that in the crease, and defends to the off side
Dhawan is finding it real easy in the middle, this time he works the ball with the angle, slapped behind point for four, Dhawan seems to have loads of time to play even against some pacy bowlers
pitched up and that was another cracking drive from Dhawan, can't beat Pollard at cover though
short of length ball on off stump, backs away and defends

a false stroke from Dhawan, Rampaul get that length ball to move away just outside off, Dhawan - usually so sure whether to leave or go after a delivery - isn't certain whether to play that or not, he fishes at it and is beaten
stays a touch low, angled in from Roach, back of a length ball on the stumps

beautiful stroke from Rohit, overpitched from Roach and that is driven through covers off the front foot for four, HotSpot shows that came right off the middle of the bat, and there was a huge gap between cover point and mid-off
short and on leg stump, helped along to fine leg for a single
full ball outside off, pushed firmly towards mid-off, the fielder manages to get a hand on that and prevent it from racing away
Rohit continues to look in terrific touch, Roach offering more short and wide deliveries, Rohit cracks that past point, makes sure it is along the ground, top shot
length ball angling in, defended to the leg side for a single
short ball spins in, punched towards cover
spins in and that is tucked towards square leg for a single
length ball on off, defended off the front foot to the off side
a touch short, Dhawan gets on the back foot and punches that towards deep point to bring up India's 50
gets this one to turn, spins towards the pads, Rohit helps the ball towards short fine leg, can't get the ball past the fielder
pushed towards extra cover to end the over

chance, sensational effort from Pollard, short of length ball wide outside off, Dhawan threw his bat at that, seemed to have sent it on its way for four, Pollard flew across from point though and got a hand on it, terrific try but can't hang on to it
length ball on off stump, dabbed towards wide mid-on for a single
again it is short and wide, at Sammy's pace (120kph) you really shouldn't be bowling there, Dhawan isn't going to miss out twice, smashed past point for four
too wide once more, fuller once, Dhawan skips out and muscles that towards the sweeper cover boundary, there's fielder in the deep to cut it off

huge lbw appeal, was it hitting just outside the line? was it going over? it was a short of length ball that pitched just outside off, struck Rohit on middle and off, replays show the only question was height, would have been 'umpire's call' if WI had referred it
punched off the back foot towards extra cover
Narine getting the ball to turn away from the left-hander, Dhawan waits for it and defends to the off side
Dhawan steps out and wanted to hit that over the leg side, a leading edge sends the ball swirling over cover
not too short from Narine, spinning away from Dhawan, who waits on the back foot and delicately sends that past the keeper and past short third man for four more
too short from Narine, Dhawan misses out, slapped towards wide mid-on but poor timing
blocked off the back foot towards mid-off
again gets on the back foot and tucks the ball to the off side
length ball way outside off, slapped towards deep backward point
length ball on off stump, defended towards mid-on from the crease
opens the face and guides the ball towards third man
a short ball, aimed at the body, Dhawan for once is caught in a tangle, has no room to free his arms and is not sure whether to sway away or play, ends up awkwardly fending it
short of length and angling away, Dhawan chases after it and misses, a mild caught-behind appeal
short and wide, steered behind point for a boundary to end the over, India motoring along here
short of length ball, defended behind point

dropped by Roach, really should have taken that, plenty of time to get under it at fine leg after Dhawan pulled that short ball, Roach misjudges and it turns into a tough ankle-high chance because of that, instead of a simple waist-high chance, bad miss given how strongly these two are going
much too wide outside off
length ball just outside off, left alone
short and wide, down to third man for a single
a full ball that Dhawan manages to keep it out
bit of width again, not enough for Dhawan to thrash that, just pushes it in front of point for a single
just outside off, guided down to third man for a single
short of length ball, on middle stump, defended to the leg side
plays down the wrong line, thick inside edge onto the thigh pad
Rohit has scored plenty of his runs in the quadrant behind point, he gets one more to third man
short of length ball, clipped to the leg side for a single
just a touch of width, crunched towards sweeper cover for a single
short and wide, at 128kph, not a good idea, Rohit slaps that behind point for four more, all too easy that
angling in towards middle, blocked to the off side
full ball on middle stump, a lovely flick sends the ball towards deep midwicket
just a bit of width, Rohit stabs it towards point but can't beat the fielder there
another four for Rohit, India gallop along ot 91 for 0, waits for the ball to arrive and plays it late, uses the width to sends it well behind point and well wide of third man
punched towards sweeper cover for a single
pitched up and on the pads, clipped towards midwicket
for the third time in two overs, Rohit punishes the bowler for giving him width, slapped behind point for four more, have to say this isn't the best bowling from West Indies
another fifty for Rohit, a huge roar from the crowd, seventh half-century against West indies, his favourite opposition without a doubt, he got to the milestone with a clip towards midwicket
shortish ball on the stumps, swatted towards deep square leg for a single
whipped towards short midwicket
short of length ball just outside off, defended from the crease to the off side
he drops it a bit short and Dhawan mistimes the pull
feeds him width, he opens the face and guides it down to third man

he drifts wide down the leg side, tries to nudge it away, there's an appeal for a catch down the leg side and he's given not out, West Indies are reviewing it, it hit the pad for sure and Hot Spot shows a faint nick and he's been given out. Well, we've seen two excellent reviews today, first to Samuels and now Rohit
elegant way to get off the mark! Gives him a hint of width and Kohli makes room and improvises, opens the face of the bat and guides it wide of Gayle at slip
stays back and pushes it to the off side
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
this one kicks up a bit and Kohli pokes outside the off stump
drifts on the body and he tucks it down to midwicket
he stays right back at the crease and hops as he fends it to the leg side
stays back at the crease and stylishly whips it to square leg
he keeps it straight, goes right back at the crease and defends
nice tight line by Kohli, hops at the crease and knocks it to midwicket
this was too wide outside off and Dhawan can't believe he only tamely played it back to the bowler, should have been spanked
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
outside off and he doesn't play at it
width again and he cuts but short third man cuts it off
sped off the bat, this was too full and Kohli merely pushed at it and it went off the meat of the bat past mid-off who dives in vain

there's an appeal for an lbw! Tried to work it across the line, came back in slightly and hit the pads and lobbed up to the off side where second slip ran and caught it, no bat  but not a bad shout for an lbw, ball tracker showed that hitting the stumps
he goes back and tucks it to the leg side to bring up his fifty! He's in some form
this was dragged too short and Kohli goes back and bludgeons it in front of square, down to wide long-on
stays back and punches it to the off side
this was the bouncer and Kohli quickly ducks under that one
this was bowled short and he mistimes the pull to mid-on

misfield! Gayle signaled to Rampaul to target Kohli's helmet, he bowled it short as instructed and Kohli was equal to the task pulling in front of his helmet, the ball brushed past Pollard at short leg and the fielder at the boundary dived and made a mess of it
gets well forward and defends
sloppy stuff from Windies! Clipped towards mid-on and Pollard's throw was wide, slip couldn't back up, overthrows
spins away and guides it past second slip for a couple
comes round the wicket and he works it to midwicket
stays back and knocks it to square leg

through the gate! Kohli's cameo ends. Narine bowls from round the wicket, lands on off and middle and goes through with the angle, Kohli stays on the back foot and tries to work it to the on side, missed a straight one
Rampaul bowls it much too short for his own comfort or Charles', bouncer sails over everyone
good length on the pads and he works it down to fine leg

He has been given out caught behind and Karthik is reviewing it, this landed outside off and held its line, Karthik was forward and the keeper was quite confident, the bat hit the pad after the ball passed the bat, that sound must have prompted the appeal, Hot Spot shows no edge
this one leaves the right-hander and he shoulders arms
fullish on middle and leg and he drives him down to mid-on
a touch wider outside off and he safely leaves it alone
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
full outside off and he drives just wide of the bowler
lovely drive, the offspinner, lands too full and wide outside off and drives crisply past cover
this  was the carrom ball, big turn and he does well to adjust his shot, drops it to point
goes back and punches another carrom ball. back to the bowler
drifts on the pads and he sweeps, Rampaul slips at fine leg and manages to field it
looked like clearing the rope initially! Roach is generous on the pads, he clips it high and it was in the air and one bounce four to deep square leg
quite stylish! Roach drags it too short, Dhawan swivels and pulls behind square, beats fine leg
almost three out of three! Drifts on the pads and he clips this one fine and Natrine times his dive well at fine leg
a little short on the body and he tucks it to the leg side
Roach fires that on the stumps and Karthik ensures he covers the line and defends
outside off and he safely leaves it alone
goes back at the crease and knocks it to the off side
drifts on the pads and he clips it behind square
good adjustment, Samuels bowled it a bit short, nit much room but Dhawan managed to cut it away fiercely past point and short third man
goes back to cut but chops it to the off side
bot too early on the sweep but struck on the pads, outside the line of leg
fullish delivery outside off and he pushes it to cover
keeps it on the stumps and he stays back and defends
this was fuller in length outside off and he pushes it to mid-off
a bit wide outside off and he leaves it alone
crisply driven, Roach bowls from wide of the crease and sprays a half volley on middle and leg, driven past mid-on who dives
tossed up outside off and he cuts him to sweeper cover
continues round the wicket, comes forward and blocks
flatter delivery and he comes forward and pushes it to the off side
goes back and punches it down to mid-on
comes forward to a full delivery and drives to cover
this was short outside off and Dhawan rocks back and pulls against the turn to deep midwicket
spins away sharply and he withdraws the shot
full outside off and he plonks forward and pushes it to cover
the off break, comes forward and the ball lobs off the pads to leg slip
full outside the off stump and defended
fullish outside the off stump and defended
tossed up wide outside the off stump, doesn't play at it
goes back at the crease and knocks it to the off side
gets an outside edge past slip as he shapes to defend
tossed up and he gets his pad across and leaves it alone
punches it to the off side and Dhawan has to dive at the crease., they hurry the single
defends to the on side

appeal for an lbw and he's been given not out, Bravo wants it reviewed, over the wicket, pitched outside leg, hits his pads as he tries to work it away, pitched outside leg anyway  so he can't be given out
stays back at the crease and knocks it to point
the off break, he clips it away firmly down to fine leg iusing the pace of the ball, the fielder tried to mop up but couldn't stop it
full outside off and he plonks forward to defend
punches it down to backward point and sets off quickly
stays back and he cuts with the turn down to sweeper cover
fires that on the stumps and he clips it away
goes back at the crease and cuts past point
tossed up on the pads and he works it behind square on the on side
tossed up outside off and he safely leaves it alone
he goes back at the crease and cuts him wide of point
too short and spins towards leg stump, clipped behind square leg
length ball spinning away, defended off the front foot
bounces more than Dhawan expects, once more he wants to chop it off the back foot but misses
length ball on the pads, tucked towards midwicket
length ball outside off, defended to the leg side
overpitched, driven towards mid-off, there's a misfield, but even then no run is taken
starts with a rank long hop, wide too, slapped to the sweeper cover boundary
flighted and full, crisp drive is stopped by a diving fielder at cover
wide, fired down the leg side
full and outside off, powered towards sweeper cover
overpitched and on off stump, defended towards point
wide down the leg side
full and on the pads, tucked towards square leg for a single
length ball on the pads, Dhawan looks to sweep and misses
outside off, and left alone
outside off and beats the outside edge
length ball outside off, not turning much in the rain, left alone
full and on middle and off, defended to the leg side
looks to defend that middle stump ball to the leg side, a leading edge sends the ball towards point
solid defense to end the over, India are coasting here
length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot down the track
shortish and wide, Dhawan has feasted on plenty of those today, can't get it to the rope this time, gets a couple
looking to tuck the ball to the leg side, a leading edge and the ball drops to the off side
pitched up and outside off, left alone by Dhawan
length ball on off stump, solid forward defensive from Dhawan
length ball around off, driven towards mid-off, India showing no great urgency here
short of length and well outside off, guided down to third man for a single
bouncer on leg stump, Dhawan considers going for the hook and then opts against it
length ball heading for the pads, tucked towards wide mid-on
another short ball, Dhawan ducks under it
short ball again, pulled away to deep backward square for a single
short and wide, chopped behind point for four more, the 200 comes up for India
full ball on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for a single
bowled from wide of the crease, clipped down to fine leg for four more
short of length ball heading for middle, defended behind point
not too far outside off, Karthik looks to chop that one and misses
on off stump, no room at all to play the cut, arching back to play that, hit twice on the blade, first high on the blade and then later low down as the ball runs towards third man
single to end the over, a powerful hit towards sweeper cover
a yorker just outside off, blocked to the off side and they scramble a single
short ball is pulled to deep square leg for a single
length ball, driven towards cover
length ball is pushed towards mid-off, a quick single is pinched
short ball is pulled towards deep square leg, for a moment Dhawan was worried as the ball ballooned in the air but it does"t carry as far as Pollard
full ball is driven to the right of the bowler and the left of mid-on for an effortless four
Pollard did a Prabhakar there, swaying away from the stumps at the last moment, angles it across the batsman who looks to scythe it through the off and misses
outside off, punched towards short third man for a single
Karthik has, as Sid Monga shouts, ramped it past Rampaul, bends his knee and plays that over the keeper and too fine for the third man fielder
dropped behind square leg for a single
length ball just outside off, punched to sweeper cover for a single
again bowled from wide of the crease, Karthik gets close to the stumps and defends

another century for Dhawan, and gets there in some style as well, his third international ton in a row from a man who stumbled in his first stint as an international player, it was short and wide, Dhawan thumps that to the backward point boundary for six, the starfish celebration that is becoming his trademark comes out
a bouncer that Dhawan bends under
another short ball, left alone by Dhawan
Bravo keeps it short, Dhawan keeps swaying out of the line, he's waiting to give Karthik a chance to get a half-century
first ball for six and then four short balls that are left alone by Dhawan
short of length ball outside off, left alone by Dhawan, end of the over, Karthik on strike

it's over, India are through, Pakistan are out, WI v SA is a quarter-final, Karthik closes out the game with an emphatic lofted cover drive that also brings up his half-century, a dominant victory for India who have underlined their claims as one of the favourites for the title
